channel.title: Software on Tamás K. Papp's website

item.title: Local packages in a separate directory in Julia
item.description: I run Pkg.update() fairly often to stay up to date and benefit from the latest improvements of various packages. I rarely ever pin to a specific package version, but I occasionally checkout master for some packages, especially if I am contributing. Despite updating regularly, I found that the documentation subtly diverged from what I was experiencing for some packages. After looking into the issue, I learned that I was 2–3 minor versions behind despite updating regularly.
